subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Rebekkah Brunson had 14 points and 10 rebounds, and the Minnesota Lynx beat the visiting Los Angeles Sparks, 94-77, in the opener of the W.N.B.A.’s Western Conference finals.
snippet: Rebekkah Brunson had 14 points and 10 rebounds, and the Minnesota Lynx beat the visiting Los Angeles Sparks, 94-77, in the opener of the W.N.B.A.’s Western Conference finals.
